code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{getUserProducts,searchProducts}from"../services/api";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarList=()=>{const[cars,setCars]=useState([]);const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchCars=async()=>{try{const{data}=await getUserProducts();setCars(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching cars",error);}};fetchCars();},[]);const handleSearch=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const{data}=await searchProducts(searchQuery);setCars(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error searching cars",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Cars"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSearch,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Search cars",value:searchQuery,onChange:e=>setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-secondary mt-2",children:"Search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-4",children:cars.map(car=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:car.images[0],alt:car.title,className:"card-img-top"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:car.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:car.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${car.id}`,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"View Details"})]})]})},car.id))})]});};export default CarList;
